sen.j: 長岡京市（ながおかきょうし）は、京都府の南西に位置する市。
sen.e: Nagaokakyo City is a city located in the southwest of Kyoto Prefecture.
Nagaokakyo City is a city located in the southwest of Kyoto Prefecture.
Nagaokakyo City is a city located in the southwest of Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 市名は長岡京にちなみ、長岡京の南部と一部市域が重なる。
sen.e: Nagaokakyo City was named after Nagaoka-kyo (imperial capital), and the part of the city corresponds to the southern part of Nagaoka-kyo,
Nagaokakyo City was named after Nagaoka-kyo (imperial capital), and the part of the city corresponds to the southern part of Nagaoka-kyo,

sen.j: 隣接する向日市、大山崎町とともにタケノコの産地として著名。
sen.e: The city as well as neighboring Muko City and Oyamazaki-cho is famous for producing bamboo shoots.
The city as well as neighboring Muko City and Oyamazaki-cho is famous for producing bamboo shoots.
The city as well as neighboring Muko City and Oyamazaki-cho are famous for producing bamboo shoots.

sen.j: 花菜（食用のアブラナ）の産地でもある。
sen.e: It also produces a flower vegetable (edible oilseed rape).
It also produces a flower vegetable (edible oilseed rape).
It also produces a flower vegetable (edible oilseed rape).

sen.j: 市制施行前は乙訓郡に属し、市内に古寺乙訓寺がある。
sen.e: The city belonged to Otokuni-gun before the shisei (grant of city status) was implemented, and thus, an old temple, Otokuni-dera Temple is located in the city.
The city belonged to Otokuni-gun before the shisei (grant of city status) was implemented, and thus, an old temple, Otokuni-dera Temple is located in the city.

sen.j: 大きく東部、中部、西部に分類できる。
sen.e: Nagaokakyo City can be divided into three main areas: the east, the middle, and the west of Nagaokakyo City.
Nagaokakyo City can be divided into three main areas: the east, the middle, and the west of Nagaokakyo City.
Nagaokakyo City can be divided into three main areas: the east, the middle, and the west of Nagaokakyo City.

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道長岡京駅周辺の東部は村田製作所、松下電器産業、三菱電機などのハイテク企業が進出しており、線路沿いには、フォークリフトで有名な日本輸送機がある。
sen.e: In the east of Nagaokakyo City around Nagaokakyo Station of West Japan Railway, high-tech companies such as Murata Manufacturing Co., Ltd., Panasonic Corporation (formerly Matsushita Electric Industrial Co., Ltd.), and Mitsubishi Electric Corporation have opened their offices and/or factories, and also Nippon Yusoki Co., Ltd., a famous forklift manufacturer, is located along the railroad.

In the east of Nagaokakyo City around Nagaokakyo Station of West Japan Railway, high-tech companies such as Murata Manufacturing Co., Ltd., Panasonic Corporation (formerly Matsushita Electric Industrial Co., Ltd.), and Mitsubishi Electric Corporation have opened their offices and/or factories, and also Nippon Yusoki Co., Ltd., a famous forklift manufacturer, is located along the railroad.

In the east of Nagaokakyo City around Nagaokakyo Station of West Japan Railway, high-tech companies such as Murata Manufacturing Co., Ltd., Panasonic Corporation (formerly Matsushita Electric Industrial Co., Ltd.), and Mitsubishi Electric Corporation have opened their offices and/or factories, and also Nippon Yusoki Co., Ltd., a famous forklift manufacturer, is located along the railroad.

sen.j: また、西山山系の湧水を利用してサントリーが大山崎町との境目近くに京都ビール工場を設置、主に西日本地区向けの製品の生産を行っている。
sen.e: Suntory also built Kyoto Brewery in the city near the border with Oyamazaki-cho, and, using the water from springs flowing from the Nishiyama Mountain Range, Kyoto Brewery produces products mainly for western Japan.

Suntory also built Kyoto Brewery in the city near the border with Oyamazaki-cho, and, using the water from springs flowing from the Nishiyama Mountain Range, Kyoto Brewery produces products mainly for western Japan.

Suntory also built Kyoto Brewery in the city near the border with Oyamazaki-cho, and, using the water from springs flowing from the Nishiyama Mountain Range, Kyoto Brewery produces products mainly for western Japan.

sen.j: かつてサントリーが地下水を大量に使用するため、市民と軋轢を生じた時期もあったが、現在はサントリーが主催する秋のビール祭に市民を招待するなどして関係の回復を図っている。
sen.e: There was a time that friction arose between Suntory and residents due to its heavy use of groundwater; currently, Suntory tries to mend the fences by, for example, inviting residents to the Beer Festival held by the company in fall.

There was a time when friction arose between Suntory and residents due to its heavy use of groundwater; currently, Suntory has tried to make amends, for example, inviting residents to the Beer Festival held by the company in fall.

sen.j: 阪急電鉄長岡天神駅の周辺の中部は、商業地、住宅地から構成されており、長岡京市の中心地となっている。
sen.e: The middle of Nagaokakyo City around Nagaoka Tenjin Station of Hankyu Corporation is comprised of commercial and residential districts, and is the center of the city.
The middle of Nagaokakyo City around Nagaoka Tenjin Station of Hankyu Corporation is comprised of commercial and residential districts, and is the center of the city.

sen.j: 大手スーパーなどもこの付近に偏っていたが、2000年台以降は、JR長岡京駅西口が再開発され、こちらにも商店の進出がなされている。
sen.e: Large grocery stores gathered around this area, but after 2000, the west exit of JR Nagaokakyo Station has been redeveloped and stores have opened in the area, as well.

sen.j: 京都府道10号大山崎大枝線（丹波街道）以西の西部は、主に西山の丘陵地帯からなる自然あふれる地域であり、後述のような有名神社仏閣などが点在する。
sen.e: The west of Nagaokakyo City to the westward of the Oyamazaki Oe Line (Tanba Kaido Road) of the Kyoto Prefectural Road 10 is an area with a wealth of nature, consisting mainly of the hillside area in Nishiyama, and where famous shrines and temples are scattered around as mentioned below.

sen.cmt: 府道→Prefectural route としました。

sen.j: また一部地域は切り開かれ、住宅地として開発されている。
sen.e: However, a part of the area has been logged and developed for housing.
However, a part of the area has been logged and developed for housing.
However, a part of the area has been logged and developed for housing.

sen.j: 日本を代表する観光地である京都市が近いために注目されることは少ないが、ロケーションには恵まれている。
sen.e: Nagaokakyo City does not receive much attention because one of the most popular tourist destinations in Japan, Kyoto City, is located nearby, but it still has a good location.
Nagaokakyo City does not receive much attention because one of the most popular tourist destinations in Japan, Kyoto City, is located nearby, but is still a good location.

sen.j: 特に竹林は美しく、平安時代の作品『竹取物語』のモデルは長岡京市もしくは京都府八幡市のどちらかであると言われている。
sen.e: Bamboo groves are especially beautiful; the setting for "Taketori Monogatari" (The Tale of the Bamboo Cutter) is said to have modeled either Nagaokakyo City or Yawata City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Bamboo groves are especially beautiful; the setting for "Taketori Monogatari" (The Tale of the Bamboo Cutter) is said to have modeled either Nagaokakyo City or Yawata City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Bamboo groves are especially beautiful; the setting for "Taketori Monogatari" (The Tale of the Bamboo Cutter) is said to have modeled either Nagaokakyo City or Yawata City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: また長岡天満宮八条ヶ池の霧島つつじ、乙訓寺の牡丹、楊谷寺のアジサイ、光明寺 (長岡京市)の紅葉も美しさに定評がある。
sen.e: Kirishima azalea by the Hachijogaike Pond at the Nagaoka-tenmangu Shrine, tree peonies at the Otokuni-dera Temple, hydrangeas at the Yokoku-ji Temple, and autumn leaf color at the Komyo-ji Temple (Nagaokakyo City) are all known for their beauty, as well.

Kirishima azalea by the Hachijogaike Pond at the Nagaoka-tenmangu Shrine, tree peonies at the Otokuni-dera Temple, hydrangeas at the Yokoku-ji Temple, and autumn leaf color at the Komyo-ji Temple (Nagaokakyo City) are all known for their beauty, as well.

sen.j: 光明寺はドラマや映画のロケにもしばしば使われる。
sen.e: The Komyo-ji Temple is often used for location shooting for movies and TV dramas.
The Komyo-ji Temple is often used for location shooting for movies and TV dramas.
The Komyo-ji Temple is often used for location shooting for movies and TV dramas.

sen.j: 秋に行われる『ガラシャ祭り』を筆頭に、かぐや姫をモチーフとした竹林のイベントや、蛍鑑賞会、天神祭、アジサイ祭り、牡丹祭りなどが開かれている。
sen.e: Nagaokakyo City holds a variety of events and festivals, from the Garasha (Gratia) Matsuri Festival in fall to the event at the bamboo grove featuring Kaguya-hime (Princess Kaguya), the firefly viewing gathering, the Tenjin Matsuri Festival, the Ajisai (hydrangea) Matsuri Festival, and the Botan (tree peony) Matsuri Festival.

Nagaokakyo City holds a variety of events and festivals, from the Garasha (Gratia) Matsuri Festival in fall to the event at the bamboo grove featuring Kaguya-hime (Princess Kaguya), the firefly viewing gathering, the Tenjin Matsuri Festival, the Ajisai (hydrangea) Matsuri Festival, and the Botan (tree peony) Matsuri Festival.

sen.j: 全国から集客したいという市の思惑はともかく、家族連れが訪れる市民憩いのイベントとしては成功しているようである。
sen.e: Putting aside the city's intention to attract visitors from all over the country, these seems to be successful events and festivals of family recreation for the residents.

sen.j: なお蛍鑑賞会は例年蛍シーズンより早く開催されることが多い。
sen.e: Incidentally, the firefly viewing gathering is often held before the season for fireflies.

sen.j: 細川玉（後のガラシャ）が勝竜寺城に住む。

sen.j: 1931年（昭和6年）8月1日 東海道本線神足駅（現長岡京駅）開業。
sen.e: On August 1, 1931, Kotari Station (the present-day Nagaokakyo Station) on the Tokaido Main Line opened.

sen.j: 1949年（昭和24年）10月1日 新神足村、海印寺村、乙訓村の3村が合併して長岡町となる。
sen.e: October 1, 1949, three villages of Shinkotari-mura, Kaiinji-mura and Otokuni-mura were combined to form Nagaoka-cho.

sen.j: 1972年（昭和47年）10月1日 市制施行により長岡京市となる。
sen.e: October 1, 1972, Nagaoka-cho became Nagaokakyo City by implementing the shisei (grant of city status).

Mukomachi Post Office in adjacent Muko City is in charge of collection and delivery in the entire area of Nagaokakyo City.
